title: Looking for Challenger and Diamond Players and Analyst/Coach to start a serious ranked team
body:
My names Bambii, I'm a league of legends Coach looking for players and 2 analysts who one day see themselves competing with the best teams OCE has to offer. 
I will not be considering any players below Diamond 5
I am also looking for analysts, rank is irrelevant

replies.body: no your name is swagzilla420 lololol

The question is, do you pay?

Secondly... No offense intended but challenger tier players aren't going to trust the coaching of a bronze/silver player. As most of the game up until plat can be played off game knowledge.... And there are other challenger tier coaches out there.

are you unaware of the difference between coaching and playing? of course though you are right that in oce for a startup team im sure people specifically looking at coaching a league team may be more useful/experienced/effective than anyone who sees this ad and wants to tryout for the position

Ign : Seethingsin
Rank: diamond 5
position: Mid laner
things about myself: Very experienced team player! I am currently in a plat 1 and plat 5 team. I am a strong shot caller and i know what it takes to work hard and improve to be the best!

Very interested! An organised team will go far so i trust !!

I'd be interested in opening discussions with you regarding potentially either playing or as an analyst (which I am interested in becoming but have no experience working with teams as of yet). Currently D5/D4, having dropped from Challenger early in the season. 

Add me in game - The Crimson Chin
Im D3 currently add me in game

I have 2 accounts diamond 5, and have experience since season 1. Willing to learn new things and take rank teams serious.
IGN: Poppy God
I am online pretty often feel free to message me.
